name: " Descendants of Monster Girl " Dress-up - Ever after Halloween hight party salon game
name_original: " Descendants of Monster Girl " Dress-up - Ever after Halloween hight party salon game
description:
If You love Halloween Party. She'll back!! Everyone loves dress up games.. But they get boring. This is not your usual dress up game.

Halloween Party girls dress-up and salon with high fashion dresses!
The combinations allow for seemingly endless fun!

Features:
- 8 Halloween Party Character
- 14 Magic stuff
- 15, Dresses
- 20 Hair
- 15, symbol
- 19, pants
- 6 backgrounds settings
- that's over 4,500,000 combinations!
- Hours of entertainment
